name: Rollacle of Seasons
description:
Rollacle of Seasons is a game made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2022, which had the theme of "Roll of the Dice."

In this game, you can play as everyone's favorite character, The D3. When The D3 rolls, they cause the world to change seasons based on what they land on!

Control Information:

  • Move Left/Right using either the Arrow Keys or A/S
  • Pause the game with Escape
  • Restart the current level with R
  • If you are stuck on a level, you can skip to the next one with =
  • If you want to replay the previous level, press -

Note: While there is some inherent controller support from Unity, it is not actually supported or tested.
